channel.title: Adding New Hitmarks [HELP]
channel.description:
Hello, I am following this guide: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.msg3844530.html#new
To add new hitmarks properly, I get stuck client sided I will post about that later.
Firstly the errors I get server sided is only in combatassistant and the errors below are there and my combatassistant.java
[code=text]src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:398: illegal start of expression public void delayedHit(int i) { // npc hit delay ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:398: illegal start of expression public void delayedHit(int i) { // npc hit delay ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:398: ';' expected public void delayedHit(int i) { // npc hit delay ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:398: ';' expected public void delayedHit(int i) { // npc hit delay ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: illegal start of expression public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: illegal start of expression public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: ';' expected public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: <identifier> expected public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: not a statement public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: ';' expected public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:649: ';' expected public void applyNpcMeleeDamage(int i, int damageMask, int j) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:754: illegal start of expression public void fireProjectileNpc() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:754: illegal start of expression public void fireProjectileNpc() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:754: ';' expected public void fireProjectileNpc() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:777: illegal start of expression public void attackPlayer(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:777: illegal start of expression public void attackPlayer(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:777: ';' expected public void attackPlayer(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:777: ';' expected public void attackPlayer(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1240: illegal start of expression public boolean usingCrystalBow() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1240: ';' expected public boolean usingCrystalBow() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: illegal start of expression public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: illegal start of expression public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: ';' expected public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: <identifier> expected public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: not a statement public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1244: ';' expected public void appendVengeance(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: illegal start of expression public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: illegal start of expression public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: ';' expected public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: <identifier> expected public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: not a statement public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1265: ';' expected public void appendVengeanceNPC(int otherPlayer, int damage) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1287: illegal start of expression public void playerDelayedHit(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1287: illegal start of expression public void playerDelayedHit(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1287: ';' expected public void playerDelayedHit(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1287: ';' expected public void playerDelayedHit(int i) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1615: illegal start of expression public boolean multis() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1615: ';' expected public boolean multis() { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: illegal start of expression public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: illegal start of expression public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: ';' expected public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: <identifier> expected public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: not a statement public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1630: ';' expected public void appendMultiBarrage(int playerId, boolean splashed) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: illegal start of expression public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: illegal start of expression public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: ';' expected public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: ')' expected public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: illegal start of expression public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:1667: ';' expected public static int finalMagicDamage(Client c) { ^ 50 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
http://pastebin.com/Kgxpmjx9 - My Combatassitant.Java
Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: Adding New Hitmarks [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:

Hello, I am following this guide: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.msg3844530.html#new
